description.en: In the distant future, advances in AI technology led to wars being fought without human soldiers. However, at the end of the 22nd century, a mysterious aircraft called "Gayla" shut down all AI, and humanity now must relearn how to wage war. Sakamoto Teppei joins the military in hopes of becoming a soldier, where he is sent into a simulation of the Battle of Waterloo to learn how to kill people.

altTitles.ja: マネマネにちにち

altTitles.vi: Ngày ngày qua ngày

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun!
description.fr: Dans une certaine lycée se trouve un certain club et ses trois managers. Bien qu'anodins, des jours comme on n'en trouve nulle part ailleurs voient le jour ! Dessiné par Yamamoto Souichiro : une toute nouvelle histoire de jeunesse sur le thème du sport !
description.ja: なんかモテそうだからとマネージャーになった、野球については全然詳しくない渚茜。野球が好きでマネージャーになった、見た目はギャルな一ノ瀬かりな。彼氏（当時）が野球部員だったのでマネージャーになった姫宮ユキ。部員のためにおにぎり作ったり、部室でエッチな本を発見しちゃったり、幼馴染の選手の素振りに付き合ったり、はじめての練習試合で緊張したり……
description.tl: Nakatakda sa beysbol klab ng isang hayskul, ito ay isang "kwentong pagdadalaga sa gilid," na nakatuon sa tatlong tagapamahala ng koponan na may napakaibang mga personalidad: si Nagisa, na halos hindi alam ang mga patakaran ng beysbol; si Ichinose, isang magarbo na gyaru; at si Himemiya, ang tahimik na babae na may nakakagulat na masamang pag-uugali.
description.vi: Slice of life của ba em quản lí CLB thể thao ở một trường cao trung nào đó... Để xem có gì hay!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

biography.en:
Sōichirō Yamamoto (山本 崇一朗, Yamamoto Sōichirō, born May 31, 1986) is a Japanese manga artist. He is known for writing and illustrating [Teasing Master Takagi-san](https://mangadex.org/title/6e445564-d9a8-4862-bff1-f4d6be6dba2c/karakai-jouzu-no-takagi-san), [Fudatsuki no Kyōko-chan](https://mangadex.org/title/3ac9fd03-e3de-4520-90aa-d9fc002eac0a/fudatsuki-no-kyoko-chan), [In the Heart of Kunoichi Tsubaki](https://mangadex.org/title/1ab5f7e0-7768-457c-9f63-19471b6503cc/kunoichi-tsubaki-no-mune-no-uchi), and [When Will Ayumu Make His Move?](https://mangadex.org/title/425f2ccf-581f-42cf-aed3-c3312fcde926/soredemo-ayumu-wa-yosetekuru), all of which were ran simultaneously during their publication. 

Yamamoto was born and raised in the town of Tonoshō in Shōdoshima, an island part of Kagawa Prefecture. His hometown would later serve as the setting for Teasing Master Takagi-san.

He is a graduate of Kyoto Seika University Faculty of Art. 

(Source: [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%C5%8Dichir%C5%8D_Yamamoto))

description.en:
*If you blush, you lose!*  Living by this principle, the middle schooler Nishikata gets constantly made fun of by his seat neighbour Takagi-san. With his pride shattered to pieces, he vows to turn the tables and get back at her someday.   And so, he attempts to tease her day after day, only to find himself falling victim to Takagi-san's ridicule again sooner than later. Will he be able to make Takagi-san blush from embarrassment even once in the end? English Chapters have been renumbered to their tank numbers, where applicable.*

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**
description.id: Komik ini bercerita tentang seorang siswa Sekolah Menengah Nishikata dan Takagi duduk bersebelahan di kelas. Takagi menikmati menggoda Nishikata dengan lelucon dan lelucon yang memalukan. Sebagai tanggapan, Nishikata membuat rencana untuk membalas dendam, tetapi dia gagal ketika dia mengidentifikasi kelemahannya dan memanfaatkannya. Dalam beberapa kasus langka di mana Takagi kehilangan tantangan, Nishikata tidak merasa seperti dia benar-benar menang. Pengaturan ini didasarkan pada kota Tonoshou di Prefektur Kagawa.
description.tl: "Kapag namula ka, talo ka." Ito na ang hindi nakasulat na patakaran na itinakda sa pagitan ng dalawa mula pa noong nagkakilala sila sa hayskul. Araw-araw, talo pagkatapos ng talo, nagsusumikap si Nishikata na makita si Takagi na mamumula sa kahihiyan, ngunit ang kanyang mga walang saysay na pagtatangka ay nagreresulta lamang sa higit pang panunuya. Sa kabila ng mabisyo na siklo ng pagtatangkang talunin ang isa't isa, magbabago pa kaya ang kanilang relasyon?
description.zh:
“脸红，你就输了！”
	
「今天一定要捉弄高木同学，让她害羞！」
某所中学，在各种方面都被邻座的女生高木同学捉弄的男生西片。
他为了对此反击而每天奋斗，但……？
这样的高木同学与西片带来的
全力「捉弄」青春大战开始了！
description.pt-br: Takagi-san, essa é a garota que se senta ao meu lado, sempre me provocando. Mas você vai ver, hoje é o dia que eu vou dar o troco e envergonhá-la!!

description.en:
Takagi and Nishikata are now married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*
description.tl: Pagkatapos ng maraming taon ng pagtitiis sa mga panunukso ni Takagi, napagtanto ni Nishikata na ang kanyang presensya sa buhay niya ay naging hindi mapapalitan. Ngayon na sila ay kasal, mas makulay ang mga araw na kanilang ginugugol na magkasama, salamat sa mga kalokohan ng kanilang pilyang anak na si Chii. Naimpluwensyahan ng kanyang ina, may ugali si Chii na manloko sa kanyang ama, na ikinadidismaya nito. Bagamat sinusubukan din ni Chi na lokohin ang kanyang ina, tila wala ni isa sa pamilya ang makatalo sa eksperto sa pang-aasar sa kanyang sariling laro.
description.pt-br:
Takagi e Nishikata agora estão casados e têm uma filha na idade do jardim de infância chamada Chi. Veja o quanto algumas coisas mudaram e outras curiosamente permaneceram as mesmas!

Nota: Os volumes coletam os capítulos em uma ordem diferente da versão web. Os capítulos aqui seguem a numeração da web sem nenhum volume.

Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…

Won 1st place in the 2018 Next Manga Awards Web Category.

description.fr: Futaba Igarashi est une petite employée de bureau qui trouve que son imposant et turbulent collègue Harumi Takeda lui met toujours des bâtons dans les roues, mais il la soutient toujours, il lui tient toujours compagnie, et elle commence à remarquer que son cœur est lentement en train de pencher vers lui...
description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

The long-awaited second part of the popular visual novel “Nukitashi” manga adaptation!

"I'm going to destroy the Perverted Sex Law!"

The story takes place on Seiran Island, a tropical island where the "Perverted Sex Law" has been enacted to combat population decline. Non-sexual behavior is punishable!? On this island where lewdness is mandatory for everyone, proud virgin Junnosuke Tachibana and the anti-copulation front NLNS rise up to destroy the Perverted Sex Law!

description.en: Indigo island is a place like no other, to deter emigration and attract tourism they have become the 'sex' destination as residents are punished if they are not have having frequent sex! On this crazy island, Hitori Misaki is still at school and one of the rare virgins trying to keep her secret and find love in such a lewd environment! The manga is based on the adult game "Nukitashi - Is this island Utopia or Dystopia?" by Qruppo!
description.vi: Đảo Seiran là một nơi không giống đâu, để ngăn chặn việc di cư và thu hút du lịch, họ đã trở thành "điểm đến tình dục" khi cư dân bị trừng phạt nếu không quan hệ tình dục! Trên hòn đảo kỳ quái này, Hitori Misaki vẫn còn đang học và là một trong những cô gái hiếm hoi còn trinh, cố gắng giữ bí mật của mình và tìm kiếm tình yêu trong một môi trường đầy dâm đãng! Manga này được dựa trên trò chơi người lớn "Nukitashi - Is this island Utopia or Dystopia?" của Qruppo!

description.en: 25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". What is her daily life like...?!
description.ja: 主人公は廣井きくり（25歳）。本編で「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりから「お姉さん」と慕われる彼女はもともと陰キャだったが、バンド活動によりカリスマあふれる存在に。現在はお酒をこよなく愛し、よく酔っ払っている。はたして彼女の日常とは……!?
description.vi: Kikuri Hiroi -"tay bass thiên tài" của SICK HACK, nỗi kinh hoàng của các địa điểm hòa nhạc, kẻ ăn hại quanh năm suốt tháng, và hình mẫu tệ nạn toàn diện - từ lâu đã cho rằng không có vấn đề nào mà cô không thể giải quyết bằng cách nốc rượu. Cho dù đó là nền kinh tế đang suy thoái, hóa đơn tiền thuê nhà quá hạn, hay chỉ đơn giản là chứng lo âu xã hội luôn chực chờ trong đầu, chỉ một cơn say với vòng tròn hạnh phúc sẽ giúp mọi chuyện tự giải quyết chính nó... phải không? Chắc chắn cuộc sống thường ngày của cô ấy không phải là  thảm họa, phải không?!

description.en: Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja: 「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.vi: Hitori Gotoh chơi guitar từ khi mới học trung học vì giấc mơ tham gia ban nhạc và trở nên nổi tiếng. Nhưng trớ trêu do tính cách hướng nội, rối loạn giao tiếp xã hội của mình mà cô không có một người bạn nào trong suốt những năm tháng cấp hai lên cấp ba. Và rồi, ước mơ đó bắt đầu có cơ sở trở thành hiện thực khi cô gặp Nijika Ijichi, một tay trống đang gấp rút tìm kiếm một người biết chơi guitar cho ban nhạc của mình.
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

altTitles.ja: 社長と酒と星

altTitles.fr: La présidente, l’alcool et les étoiles

altTitles.es-la: La Presidenta, El Alcohol y Las Estrellas

altTitles.pt-br: A Presidente, o Álcool e as Estrelas

description.en: Reina Izutsu (24) has just taken over as president of Izutsu Printing after the sudden passing of her father. Kenichi Ishizumi (37), a section chief at the company, worries about Reina, who's been coming down a bit too hard on the staff as she struggles to fill her father's shoes. One night, he runs into her at a park, drunk and frustrated, blurting out, "I can't take this anymore! I quit being the president!" Too tipsy to even recognize him as her subordinate, Reina lets her guard down, and under the stars, Ishizumi quietly vows to support her however he can.
description.fr:
Reina Izutsu, 24 ans, vient de reprendre la direction de l’imprimerie familiale après la disparition soudaine de son père. Mais endosser ce rôle n’a rien d’évident… et ses employés en font les frais.

Kenichi Ishizumi, 37 ans, chef de service discret et loyal, s’inquiète pour elle. Un soir, il la croise par hasard dans un parc. Ivre et à bout de nerfs, Reina explose : “J’en peux plus ! J’arrête d’être présidente !” Sans même réaliser qu’elle parle à un de ses subordonnés, elle se livre entièrement…

Sous les étoiles, une promesse silencieuse naît. Kenichi décide de la soutenir, peu importe ce qu’il en coûte.

Une comédie romantique douce-amère, entre patronne déboussolée et employé attentionné, à savourer avec un verre… et un cœur grand ouvert.
description.ja: 亡くなった先代社長の父の後を継いで、印刷会社・井筒印刷の若社長になった井筒玲奈(24)。係長の石墨憲一(37)は気を張るあまり社員達にキツくなりがちな玲奈を心配するが、夜の公園で酒を呷りながら「もう無理！ 社長やめる」と弱音を吐く彼女と接する。そして、泥酔のあまり部下の自分と気づかれないまま、彼女を支えようと星空の下で誓う…。KOWAI!? KAWAII‼
description.nl:
Reina Izutsu (24) staat plots aan het roer van Izutsu Printing na het onverwachte overlijden van haar vader. Vastbesloten om zijn nalatenschap voort te zetten, zet ze zich keihard in, misschien wel té hard. Haar strenge houding zorgt voor spanningen binnen het bedrijf, iets waar Kenichi Ishizumi (37), afdelingshoofd en trouwe werknemer, zich zorgen over maakt.

Op een avond treft hij Reina dronken en gefrustreerd in het park. “Ik stop ermee, ik wil geen president meer zijn!” roept ze uit, zich niet eens bewust van zijn aanwezigheid als ondergeschikte. In dat kwetsbare moment ziet Ishizumi een andere kant van haar, en onder de sterren besluit hij haar vanaf dat moment onvoorwaardelijk te steunen.
description.pt-br: Reina Izutsu (24) acaba de assumir a presidência da Izutsu Printing após o falecimento repentino de seu pai. Kenichi Ishizumi (37), chefe de seção da empresa, preocupa-se com Reina, que tem sido um pouco dura demais com a equipe enquanto luta para substituir o pai. Certa noite, ele a encontra em um parque, bêbado e frustrado, e grita: "Não aguento mais! Desisto de ser presidente!". Embriagada demais para sequer reconhecê-lo como seu subordinado, Reina baixa a guarda e, sob as estrelas, Ishizumi jura discretamente apoiá-la no que puder.

description.en: Maruo failed in his debut in high school and has become a bit of an outcast. He earns some extra money by taking spy photos of girls at school and selling them to boys. Recently, Maruo is concerned about Tabe, a girl who is always covered in scars and being bullied. He wants to help her, but he is afraid of being bullied. In addition, Tabe is also a target of his voyeurism, and Maruo feels self-loathing. Maruo's days are filled with worries, but a fact comes to light that brings him to the brink of despair.
description.ja: 日暮まるおは高校デビューに失敗し、ありあまる性欲を持て余す日々。そんなある日、尊敬する自慢の兄が児童買春容疑で逮捕されてしまう。自分もこのままでは兄のようになってしまうのではないか…。まるおは密かに想いを寄せる女子・多部さんの言葉に導かれ、自分のヤラしい欲望に忠実な「青春」を始めることを決意する！

description.ja: 「お前をこのギルドから追放する。――だが能力を活かせる転職先は用意しておいた」かつて所属したギルドから追放されて苦い思いをした冒険者アクト・エイジは、新ギルド【天与の原石】を自ら設立し、Sランクギルドに上り詰めていた。しかし世間では、メンバーを次々に追放する悪徳ギルドマスターと噂され…。わんこ系クールメイド、おてんば王女、強すぎる勇者など…個性あふれる仲間に囲まれながら、悪徳(？)ギルドマスターは今日も人を見抜き、育て、追放する!!

description.en: In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
description.hu:
Amerikában a régi vadnyugaton, a világ legnagyobb szabású versenye hamarosan kezdődik. Ezrek állnak rajzvonalhoz San Diegoban, hogy utazzanak több mint hat ezer kilómétert annak reményében, hogy megnyerhetik az ötven millió dolláros fődíjat. A lovak kora elérkezett a végéhez, így a versenyzők szabadon használhattak bármiféle járművet. A versenyzőknek el kell majd tűrniük a fárasztő körülményeket, naponta több mint, száz kilómétert megtéve felfedezetlen vidékeken. A Steel Ball Run egy igazán egyedülálló esemény.

A fiatalos Johnny Joestar, egy tolószékes korábbi lovas versenyző, eljött San Diegoba, hogy megnézze a verseny rajtját. Itt találkozik Gyro Zeppelivel, egy versenyzővel két acél golyóval a derekán fegyver helyett. Johnny szemtanúja lesz annak, hogy Gyro használja az egyik acélgolyóját, szabadjára engedve annak erejét, hogy arra kényszerítsen egy férfit egy párbaj közben, hogy lőjje le magát. Az ütközet közepette, Johnny megérinti az
acélgolyót és érezte, hogy egy erő végigáramlik a lábán, rábírva őt arra, hogy felálljon először két év után. Megfogadja, hogy rájön, hogy mi a titka az acélgolyóknak, Johnny eldönti, hogy indul a versenyen, így kezdődik el az ő bizarr kalandja Amerikán keresztül a Steel Ball Runban.
description.it:
Nel west americano, la gara più grande e importante del mondo sta per iniziare. Migliaia di persone sono pronte a partire da San Diego per viaggiare più di seimila chilometri incoraggiati da un premio enorme da cinquanta milioni di dollari. L'era dei cavalli sta per finire, i partecipanti allora possono usare il veicolo che preferiscono. I partecipanti devono superare situazioni estenuanti, viaggiando centinaia di chilometri al giorno passando per valli deserte inesplorate. La Steel Ball Run è unica nel suo genere.  
  
Giovane Johnny Joestar, un ex corridore di cavalli disabile, è venuto a San Diego per vedere la partenza della gara. Lì incontra Gyro Zeppelli, un corridore con due sfere d'acciaio pendenti fino alla sua vita, al posto della pistola. Johnny vede la sfera di Gyro e capisce della sua potenzialità, riuscendo a far suicidare il nemico durante un duello. Nel mezzo dell'azione, Johnny tocca la sfera d'acciaio di Gyro e sente passare una potenza nelle sue gambe, questa potenza lo fa alzare in piedi per la prima volta dopo due anni. Dopo aver giurato di capire il segreto di quelle sfere, Johnny decide di partecipare alla gara, e qui iniziano le sue bizzarre avventure per tutta l'America nella Steel Ball Run.
description.pt-br: Nos Estados Unidos, na década de 1890, um homem chamado Steven Steel decide promover a "Steel Ball Run", uma corrida corta-mato cujo trajeto atravessa todo o país. A corrida é um grande atrativo mundial que chama a atenção tanto de corredores americanos como de corredores estrangeiros. Entre esses corredores estão Johnny Joestar, um ex-jóquei americano, e Gyro Zeppeli, um estrangeiro que carrega consigo misteriosas esferas de aço. Johnny e Gyro se esbarram e dão início à história da sétima parte de JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

biography.en:
**Hirohiko Araki** (荒木 飛呂彦, born June 7, 1960) is a Japanese manga artist. He is best known for his long-running series JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, which was first published in Weekly Shōnen Jump in 1987 and has sold over 100 million copies as of 2016 in Japan alone.

Araki participated in the Junior Baseball Team in primary school and Kendo Club in middle school. He has a pair of twin younger sisters. Because he was often bullied by his sister, he would hide away to read manga. He liked manga when he was a child, so he wants to be a manga artist. His favorite works are Star of the Giants by Kajiwara Ikki , and Babel II by Yokoyama. Araki had the experience of shaking hands with Tezuka Osamu.

He likes western pop music, horror movies and Italy very much. We can see a lot of the above elements in his representative work JOJO.His painting style was influenced by Renaissance paintings, especially Michelangelo.

He gets up at 10 a.m. every day, draws a Name on Sunday, finishes the draft from Monday to Thursday, rests on Friday and Saturday, and doesn't stay up late. This work and rest lasted more than ten years . The work and rest of this law is influenced by the manga artist [Akimoto Osamu](https://mangadex.org/author/1cd79d33-68b3-4879-b67a-834055ef99eb/akimoto-osamu). Although he is over 50, his face does not show his old state. He is even joked by other manga artists and fans as "the younger he lives", "Immortality", "using corrugation or stone ghost face", "in fact, he is also a Stand, and his ability is that he will not grow old".

description.en: The highly acclaimed sixth arc of Hirohiko Araki’s JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure shifts the action from Italy to America, as Jolyne Cujoh—daughter of Jotaro Kujo—is sentenced to 15 years in prison for a murder she didn’t commit! In a bizarre turn of events, the prison is filled with Stand users. Some become her allies, but many are sent to kill Jolyne and her friends in a scheme to resurrect the scourge of the Joestar family—DIO! It’s a battle for survival in a prison where death lurks around every corner while Jolyne fights to save her father’s life in JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 6—Stone Ocean!
description.it: La storia della figlia di Jotaro Kujo, Jolyne Cujoh. È stata accusata di un omicidio e finisce nella prigione di Green Dolphin Street. Suo padre gli ha dato un amuleto, con cui si ferisce la mano e sblocca la sua abilità stand, Stone Free, che permette di trasformare il suo corpo in una stringa comandabile. La stringa può creare uno stand umanoide che arriva fino a 2 metri dal suo corpo, e può estenderlo come il filo. Nella prigione trova preso degli alleati portatori di Stand come Hermes (Kiss) e Foo Fighters.
description.kk: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken (ДжоДжоның шытырман хикаясы) сериясының алтыншы оқиғалы доғасы.Джотаро Куджоның қызы Джолин Куджоның оқиғасы. Ол кісі өлтіргені үшін сотталып, Green Dolphin Street түрмесінде қалады. Оған әкесінен қалған тұмар беріледі, ол оның қолын кесіп, оның денесін тірі жіпке айналдыруға мүмкіндік беретін Stone Free қабілетін ашады. Жіп оның денесінен 2 метр қашықтықта гуманоидтық тірек жасай алады және одан әрі жіп ретінде созылуы мүмкін. Түрмеде ол көп ұзамай сотталған әріптестерімен және Эрмес (Kiss) және Foo Fighters стендінің пайдаланушыларымен одақтас болады.
description.es-la: La historia de la hija de Jotaro Kujo (Parte 3), Jolyne Kujo. La acusan de un asesinato y termina en la prisión de Green Dolphin Street. Le dan un amuleto heredado de su padre, que le hace un corte en la mano y hace aparecer su stand, Stone Free, que le permite desenredar su cuerpo en una cuerda a su control. La cuerda puede tener una forma humanoide en el rango de 2 metros desde su cuerpo, y puede extenderse más como una cuerda. En la prisión, pronto se vuelve aliada con sus compañeros convictos y usuarios de Stand, Hermes (Kiss) y Foo Fighters (Goo Goo Dolls).

description.en: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.
description.pl:
Ósma część serii JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. 
Począwszy od trzęsień ziemi w 2011, w miasteczku Morioh zaczęły występować rozległe uskoki, nazwane Murami Oczu. Pomimo przeprowadzonych badań, przyczyna ich wzniesienia pozostaje nieznana. W międzyczasie młoda dziewczyna imieniem Yasuho Hirose znajduje zakopanego mężczyznę ze znamieniem w kształcie gwiazdy otoczonym śladami ugryzienia. Mężczyzna przyjąwszy łatkę człowieka z amnezją, został przyjęty do mieszkającej w pobliżu rodziny oraz nadano mu imię - Jōsuke Higashikata. Jednakże, tajemnicze wydarzenia wcale nie ustają, a zagadkowe Standy dopełniają poczucie zdezorientowania.
- Czarno-biała wersja wygrała główną nagrodę w kategorii mangi w 17 edycji Japońskiego Festiwalu Sztuki w 2013 roku.
description.es-la:
El arco de la octava historia de la serie: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

Tras el gran terremoto del este en Japón, Morioh ha sido golpeado por grandes protuberancias de tierra conocidas por los lugareños como Los Muros con Ojos. A pesar de la investigación, las estimaciones profesionales quedan vacías. Mientras tanto, la joven Yasuho Hirose, descubre a un hombre enterrado en la tierra, este posee una distintiva marca de nacimiento en forma de estrella junto con marcas de mordeduras profundas. El hombre, que ha contraído un caso básico de amnesia, es acogido por una familia local y recibe el nombre de Jousuke Higashikata, sin embargo, los eventos misteriosos no pueden evitar que se acumulen unos sobre otros y pronto ese enigma conocido como "stand", emerge para complementar la gran nube de confusión.

° Ganó el Gran Premio en la categoría de manga en el 17º Festival de Artes de Medios de Japón en 2013.

description.en:
O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

description.en:
In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  
  
The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
description.hu:
Amerikában a régi vadnyugaton, a világ legnagyobb szabású versenye hamarosan kezdődik. Ezrek állnak rajzvonalhoz San Diegoban, hogy utazzanak több mint hat ezer kilómétert annak reményében, hogy megnyerhetik az ötven millió dolláros fődíjat. A lovak kora elérkezett a végéhez, így a versenyzők szabadon használhattak bármiféle járművet. A versenyzőknek el kell majd tűrniük a fárasztő körülményeket, naponta több mint, száz kilómétert megtéve felfedezetlen vidékeken. A Steel Ball Run egy igazán egyedülálló esemény.

A fiatalos Johnny Joestar, egy tolószékes korábbi lovas versenyző, eljött San Diegoba, hogy megnézze a verseny rajtját. Itt találkozik Gyro Zeppelivel, egy versenyzővel két acél golyóval a derekán fegyver helyett. Johnny szemtanúja lesz annak, hogy Gyro használja az egyik acélgolyóját, szabadjára engedve annak erejét, hogy arra kényszerítsen egy férfit egy párbaj közben, hogy lőjje le magát. Az ütközet közepette, Johnny megérinti az
acélgolyót és érezte, hogy egy erő végigáramlik a lábán, rábírva őt arra, hogy felálljon először két év után. Megfogadja, hogy rájön, hogy mi a titka az acélgolyóknak, Johnny eldönti, hogy indul a versenyen, így kezdődik el az ő bizarr kalandja Amerikán keresztül a Steel Ball Runban.
description.uk: Вересень 1980. Дикий Захід. Америка. Жокеї зі всього світу чекають гонку "Сталева Куля", яка ось-ось розпочнеться. Тисячі людей вишиковуються в Сан-Дієго, щоб подолати понад шість тисяч кілометрів заради шансу отримати головний приз — п’ятдесят мільйонів доларів. Юний Джонні Джостар, каліка, колишній жокей та популярний скакун, приїхав до Сан-Дієґо, щоб подивитися на старт перегонів. Там він зустрічає Джайро Цеппелі, гонщика з двома сталевими кулями на талії замість револьвера, звичної зброї для жителів. Джонні бачить, як Джайро використовує одну зі своїх сталевих куль, змушуючи людину вистрілити з рушниці в себе під час дуелі. Поклявшись знайти таємницю сталевих куль, Джонні вирішує взяти участь у гонці. Так і починається його химерна пригода.
description.pt-br: Nos Estados Unidos, na década de 1890, um homem chamado Steven Steel decide promover a "Steel Ball Run", uma corrida corta-mato cujo trajeto atravessa todo o país. A corrida é um grande atrativo mundial que chama a atenção tanto de corredores americanos como de corredores estrangeiros. Entre esses corredores estão Johnny Joestar, um ex-jóquei americano, e Gyro Zeppeli, um estrangeiro que carrega consigo misteriosas esferas de aço. Johnny e Gyro se esbarram e dão início à história da sétima parte de JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

altTitles.ja: イーヴォー

description.en:
Work, sleep, work, sleep... what a dull existence
Why even live?!
No hopes, no dreams
Everything’s predictable...
Suicide is salvation
But when you wake up in purgatory...
...and it's the same world you left?

One option left
Let's turn this fuckin' world upside down


The story of "Evol" begins in a village occupied by an armed group when a young girl, driven by despair, attempts suicide. She survives and wakes up, but when a man tries to drive her into a corner, a strange phenomenon occurs. The place changes, and something also happens to the boy who wakes up in the hospital after committing suicide.
description.es: Trabajar, dormir, trabajar, dormir... qué existencia más aburrida. ¡¿Para qué vivir?! Sin esperanzas, sin sueños. Todo es tan previsible... El suicidio es la única salvación. Pero cuando te despiertas en el infierno... ¿Y si resulta que es el mismo mundo que abandonaste? Solo queda una opción. Pongamos este maldito mundo patas arriba.

title.en: The Day of the Shooting Star

description.en: Chen Xin and Lin Anyun were looking up at the sky on an ordinary night after getting off work. They saw three shooting stars pass by at the same time and made their own wishes. When they woke up the next day, they found that their souls had been swapped and began a wonderful journey. In the process, the things that they usually ignored, the things they couldn't see clearly because of their own identities, what they wanted but couldn’t get, and the compromises they had to make... Were all solved miraculously. The two were attracted to each other and eventually they ran towards each other; turning into partners who worked and grew together hand in hand. When the night where three shooting stars pass by comes again, will they be able to return to being themselves?

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？
description.pt-br: Uichi já foi um garoto popular e deseja ser um veterinário, porém com o passar do tempo virou alvo de bullying. Então, quando tudo estava sendo horrível, de repente, seu primeiro amor, Yotsuba, aparece em sua frente. Qual será o objetivo dessa linda e corajosa garota que não aparecia a 7 anos?
description.zh-hk: 某天，曾很有人氣的宇一的生活陡然一變。 以往光芒四射的日子被抹布也無法擦去的黑暗所籠罩。 這時，熟悉宇一過去的初戀── 四葉突然出現在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！ ？

altTitles.ja: らき☆すた

description.en:
Lucky Star's story portrays the lives of several school girls attending a Japanese high school with a very loose humor tone.  
  
The setting is based on the town Kasukabe in Saitama Prefecture. The female lead is Konata Izumi, an athletic and intelligent girl who, despite these attributes, is not in a sports club, and has low grades. Her laziness at school is due to her love for anime and video games and lack of interest in anything else. In other words: she's an otaku.  
  
The serialization began with the four main characters in their first year of high school: Konata Izumi, Kagami Hiiragi, Tsukasa Hiiragi, and Miyuki Takara. As the story progresses, they move onto their second and third year.
description.ru: Сюжет Lucky Star крутится вокруг ученицы старшей школы Конаты Идзуми. Коната — отаку. Она весь день проводит за игрой в приставку, чтением манги и просмотром любимых аниме-сериалов, а ночью сидит в чатах и онлайн-играх. Хоть Коната и ходит в школу для одарённых детей, на домашние задания и прочую учёбу времени ей не хватает, поэтому она имеет обыкновение готовиться в последнюю ночь перед экзаменом. В школе у неё появляются три лучшие подруги: красавица, умница и тихоня Миюки Такара, милая недотёпа Цукаса Хиираги и её сестра-близнец Кагами Хиираги — целеустремленный эгоцентрик. Обладая столь разными характерами девочки уживаются вместе без проблем, иногда вздорят, но в целом живут очень дружно.
description.pt-br:
A história de Lucky Star retrata a vida de várias garotas de uma escola secundária japonesa com um tom de humor muito solto.
  
O cenário é baseado na cidade Kasukabe na província de Saitama. A protagonista feminina é Konata Izumi, uma garota atlética e inteligente que, apesar desses atributos, não está em um clube esportivo e tem notas baixas. Sua preguiça na escola se deve ao seu amor por animes e videogames e falta de interesse por qualquer outra coisa. Em outras palavras: ela é uma otaku.
  
A serialização começou com os quatro personagens principais em seu primeiro ano do ensino médio: Konata Izumi, Kagami Hiiragi, Tsukasa Hiiragi e Miyuki Takara. Conforme a história avança, eles passam para o segundo e terceiro ano.

title.en: The Villainess Will Die in Three Years

altTitles.en: It Appears That the Disappointing Villainess Will Die in Three Years

altTitles.ja: 残念系悪役令嬢は3年後に破滅するようです

altTitles.en: Regrettably, The Villainess Will Fall Into Destruction Three Years Later

description.en:
Uruwashi Maria, a student at the Hananomiya private academy is a strong-willed and selfish "villainess." Her life is on easy mode and she has no enemies, but one day the memories of her past life come to her. Suddenly she remembers that in her previous life she was a normal high school girl. And she’s seen this life of hers play out before in a manga she read in her previous life! According to memories of her past life, Maria is killed by somebody in the manga. "And I don't know who did it because I died before I could read the ending!"  
  
Can Maria avoid her death and find happiness?

title.en: The Male Leads Trapped in My House

description.en:
I reincarnated as the heiress of a powerful conglomerate family in a novel.  
The problem is, this world is about to be destroyed by monstrous viruses.  

With nothing but money to spare, I quickly bought a mansion in the countryside to build a shelter to escape the monsters…  
But the world ended far sooner than I had anticipated. Damn it!  

*  

On top of that, somehow, the male leads ended up trapped in my house with me.  
And these guys don’t seem to have any intention of leaving.  
Why do they look like they have no plans to go to the female lead?  

“Who exactly are you?”  
“You seem like someone who knew the world was going to end beforehand.”  

They were full of questions about me, but I couldn’t answer them. They wouldn’t believe me anyway.  
Right now, all I see them as is a good source of labor.  

“Alright, let’s work. You need to earn your keep for what you eat!”  

If I can find the cure for the virus causing the apocalypse, this hellish time will finally end.  
So, until then, I’ll make use of the male leads and hang on!  

*  

But one problem has come up.  
It turns out that this old mansion I purchased is far more suspicious than I thought.  
What on earth is happening in my house?

altTitles.ja: 百瀬アキラの初恋破綻中。

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love Is Coming Apart.

altTitles.pt-br: O Primeiro Amor de Momose Akira em Ruínas

altTitles.ru: Первая любовь Акиры Момосе терпит крах.

altTitles.es: El primer amor de Momose Akira se derrumba.

altTitles.vi: Mối tình đầu đầy trắc trở của Momose Akira
Mối Tình Đầu Của Akira Momose Đang Trên Bờ Vực Đổ Vỡ

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés du premier amour de Momose Akira.

description.en: Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire. Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach. And there was a “fate” that was more than he could have imagined.
description.es:
Kugayama Hajime, un chico que vive en el campo, se reencuentra con su antigua compañera de clase Momose Akira, a la que solía admirar.

Justo cuando está a punto de observarla desde lejos y disfrutar de su agridulce juventud, Akira se acerca de forma inesperada.

Y el "destino" es mucho más de lo que él pudo haberse imaginado.
description.fr: Kugayama Hajime, un garçon vivant à la campagne, revient vers son ancien camarade de classe Momose Akira, qu'il avait l'habitude d'admirer.Alors qu'il s'apprête à la regarder de loin et à profiter de sa jeunesse aigre-douce, Akira fait une approche inattendue.Et il y a eu un « destin » qui a été plus que ce qu'il aurait pu imaginer.
description.ja: ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。
description.pl: Kugayama Hajime, chłopiec mieszkający na wsi, spotyka swoją dawną koleżankę z klasy, Momose Akiry, którą podziwiał. Gdy tylko zamierza obserwować ją z daleka i cieszyć się swoją słodko-gorzką młodością, Akira niespodziewanie zbliża się do niego. A za tym kryło się „przeznaczenie”, którego nie mógł sobie nawet wyobrazić.
description.ru: Жизнь Хадзимэ Кугаямы, мальчишки из глухой деревушки, круто меняется, когда в его жизнь возвращается бывшая одноклассница и когда-то недосягаемая мечта — Акира Момосэ. Он планировал просто наблюдать за ней издалека и наслаждаться воспоминаниями о своей юности... Но неожиданно Акира делает первый шаг навстречу. И вот тут начинается нечто гораздо большее, чем он мог себе представить. Следите за их историей и согревайте свои сердца вместе с ними.
description.tr: Taşrada yaşayan bir çocuk olan Kugayama Hajime’nin, eskiden hayranlık duyduğu sınıf arkadaşı Momose Akira geri döner. Tam onu uzaktan izleyip tatlı ekşi gençliğinin tadını çıkarmak üzereyken, Akira beklenmedik bir yaklaşımda bulunur. Ve hayal edebileceğinden de öte bir “kader” ile karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: Kugayama Hajime é um jovem que vive no interior. Sua vida muda quando Momose Akira, uma antiga colega de escola por quem ele sempre foi apaixonado, retorna à cidade. Hajime planejava admirá-la de longe, saboreando um romance juvenil agridoce. Mas, para sua surpresa, Akira toma a iniciativa de se aproximar. O que se desenrola a partir daí é um destino mais surpreendente do que ele jamais poderia ter imaginado.

biography.en: **Name In Native Language:** 晴川シンタ
**Name In Native Language:** 晴川シンタ

description.en: A young protagonist who, feeling disconnected from his surroundings, leaps from a high bridge and experiences a transformative journey into an alternate reality. This act serves as a metaphorical gateway, prompting him to question the nature of his existence and the world around him. Throughout the series, the protagonist confronts various challenges that interplay between reality and illusion, compelling him to make choices that define his identity and destiny. The narrative explores themes of self-discovery, the courage to pursue one's convictions despite societal pressures, and the quest for authenticity in a world rife with facades.

title.en: I’m in Love with My Foe

altTitles.en: I Confessed to My Mortal Enemy

description.fr: Jiang Mi se réincarne dans le corps d'Olive, la méchante d'un roman populaire qui est destinée à être exécutée par le prince héritier Reynold pour son terrible comportement. Mais Olive aspire à changer son destin et à vivre une vie longue et épanouie. Elle travaille donc dur pour changer sa mauvaise image et prouver sa gentillesse. Bientôt, ses efforts attirent l'attention de Reynold, l'homme même qui est censé la tuer. Si Olive parvient à conquérir le cœur de Reynold, elle sera assurée de vivre une vie heureuse avec un bel homme ! Mais si elle n'y parvient pas, elle sait comment cette histoire se terminera...

altTitles.ja: 鬼切丸

description.en:
There was once an oni mother who gave birth to a human-looking child. Instead of an oni's horn, this child was born with a sword in hand called the "Onigirimaru" or Oni Slayer. He has no name and is only referred to by the name of his sword. Though he appears human, he is pure oni.  
  
Believing that he will become human once all of his kind vanished from the world of humans, he sets out on his destiny to slay all of his kind. Even now, in the mother world of Japan, he is still out there slaying oni.

title.en: Inou Dousei ~ Hono'o to Ko'ori no Nouryokusha no Ba'ai

altTitles.ja: 『異能同棲～炎と氷の能力者の場合～』

description.en: A story about a couple - a cryomancer and a pyromancer - living together.

altTitles.ja: 君と掴む光。

description.en:
“I wish to have you by my left shoulder, with a smile by my right– I wish to run freely in your eyes– I wish for one look to last a lifetime.”   
  
Jiang Cheng, an accomplished student, was "exiled" to the steel mill where his biological father worked. This strange, foreign environment, coupled with his rather vulgar biological father, caused Jiang Cheng to feel quite depressed… that is, until one day, he met Gu Fei, the "Delinquent of the Steel Mill", by chance. Thus begins the story of Jiang Cheng and Gu Fei, a story of salvation and hope…

(by Jupiter Scanlations)

title.en: My Bias Gets On The Last Train

altTitles.vi: Định mệnh đôi ta giao thoa nơi bến tàu

description.en:
“Meeting her on the last train again today, if only I could talk to her!”
College student Lee Yeowoon works late and takes the last train every night.
Each time, he runs into Shin Haein, a woman carrying a guitar. As if by chance, as if by fate,
the two keep meeting and discover that their favorite artist is the indie musician “Long Afternoon.” They gradually grow closer and so the story began.
description.fr:
« La croiser encore ce soir dans le dernier train... si seulement j’osais lui parler ! »
Lee Yeowoon, un étudiant, travaille tard et prend le dernier train chaque nuit.
À chaque trajet, il aperçoit Shin Haein, une femme portant une guitare. Par un curieux hasard, ou peut-être par un coup du destin, leurs chemins ne cessent de se croiser. Ils découvrent alors qu’ils partagent un même artiste préféré : le musicien indie Long Afternoon. Peu à peu, ils se rapprochent, et c’est ainsi que leur histoire commence.

altTitles.ja: しあわせ鳥見んぐ

description.en:
Suzu, an art student in a creative rut, finds new inspiration when she meets a beautiful girl at the park who introduces her to the colourful world of birdwatching.  
  
Serialised monthly in Manga Time Kirara.

title.en: The Devil Who Kisses My Feet

altTitles.en: The Demon Who Kisses My Foot

description.en:
Maria, who is in an unhappy marriage with her sadistic husband, unexpectedly receives news. Lowell, her husband's half-brother, had returned from the battlefield.

 Maria, who had personally educated and raised him, learned that he  was no longer the small child or immature boy Maria remembered. He had the appearance of a grown man. 

With his appearance, a rift slowly began to appear in the seemingly peaceful Marquis Redford.

Where would this relationship, which should never have begun, end?
description.pl: Kiedy młoda Maria zostaje wydana za mąż za Jacquesa Redforda, bogatego szlachcica, jest wdzięczna, że wydaje się on być łagodny i wyrozumiały. Jednak posiadłość Redfordów skrywa mroczne sekrety, a życie Marii zmienia się na gorsze, gdy na jaw wychodzą sadystyczne upodobania jej męża. Nie mając nikogo, na kim mogłaby się oprzeć, Maria znajduje pocieszenie w towarzystwie nieślubnego przyrodniego brata Jacquesa, Lowella. Teraz, gdy Lowell wrócił do domu jako bohater wojenny, czy może uratować Marię przed jej okrutnym losem?

title.en: Akagi: The Genius Who Fell Into Darkness

altTitles.ja: アカギ－闇に降り立った天才
闘牌伝説アカギ 闇に舞い降りた天才

description.en: The year is 1958, in the midst of a period of rapid economic growth. One rainy night at a mahjong parlor, Nangou, who was challenging the yakuza to a life-threatening game, was gradually being pushed into a corner. Suddenly, a soaking wet boy walks into the parlor. Nangou senses something extraordinary in him, and asks the boy, who has never even held a mahjong tile before, to play in his place. This is when the legend began. The boy's name was Akagi Shigeru, later known as the "Man of the Divine Realm."

biography.en: **Native Name**: 福本伸行
**Native Name**: 福本伸行

altTitles.ja: ワシズ 閻魔の闘牌

description.en: A spin-off of Akagi that depicts the charismatic exploits of Washizu Iwao, Akagi Shigeru's ultimate enemy, in his younger days. In 1948, under the American occupation of Japan, Washizu is undefeated in high-rate mahjong games against American commissioned officers. Eventually, they hire a cheater as a rep player, who has a grudge against the Special Higher Police, to play in their place to counter Washizu, who has a terrifying brain and used to belong to the Special Higher Police...

title.en: Washizu: The Mahjong Player that Ruled a Nation

altTitles.ja: ワシズ 天下創世闘牌録

description.en: The second installment of the Washizu series about Washizu Iwao, Akagi Shigeru's strongest rival. A few years after Enma no Touhai, Washizu has grown Kyousei into one of Japan's leading companies and declares at a party of political and business leaders that it is him who will control the country in the future. Naturally, those who don't take kindly to Washizu's attitude regard him as a political enemy, and begin their move to crush him behind the scenes…

title.en: Ten - The Nice Guy on the Path of Tenho

altTitles.en: Ten - The Blessed Way of the Nice Guy

altTitles.ja: 天－天和通りの快男児

description.en: Ten is a friendly guy who happens to be good at Mahjong. Or, more appropriately, good at cheating at Mahjong. If someone is betting on a Mahjong game and ends up in a pinch, they call Ten to win for them. He always does, and because he understands how frustrating it is, always has the courtesy to give the people he cheats against a chance to beat him up. With his friends Hiroyuki, Ken, Akagi, and others, he eventually decides to take on something much bigger than cheating in small gambles.

altTitles.ja: 闇麻のマミヤ

description.en: It has been 20 years since the legendary mahjong player, Akagi, left this world. In this new era known as "Reiwa," a mahjong player who solves disputes with mahjong gambles has appeared, only known as "Yami-Mahjong Fighter Mamiya!"

title.en: Official Crossover Legend: Fukumoto All Stars

altTitles.en: Official Crossover Tale: Fukumoto All Stars

altTitles.ja: 公式越境伝 福本ALLSTARS

description.en:
In the suburbs of M City, a town full of people with unusual personalities, all kinds of extraordinary slapstick incidents are taking place on a daily basis. Gambler Itou Kaiji lives as a NEET and is treated as a useless member of society by the people around him, but he is unable to reform. In the meantime, Akagi Shigeru (13), Akagi Shigeru (19), and Akagi Shigeru (Man of the Divine Realm) are living as part of the Akagi residence and causing trouble around them.

In addition, the old villains including Hyoudou Kazutaka and Washizu Iwao are enjoying shady events at the retirement home Espoir, while Hirai Ginji, the head of the neighborhood association, is scheming to make money, and genius boy Ukai Zero has confrontations with Shirube at the arcades.

altTitles.ja: アカギ　ざわ・・ざわ・・アンソロジー

description.en: A collection of one-shot tributes to [*Akagi*](https://mangadex.org/manga/3148) compiled for Akagi's 20th Anniversary. 36 different mangaka, including Jiro Maeda, the creator of *HERO*, come together to pay tribute to a very long-running manga series!

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

biography.en:
His pen name means a “mole under the eye” (he has one).

Born in Osaka. He was a former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club, one of the most famous and strongest baseball schools, and played at Koshien as a regular when he was a 3rd year.

Often went to [Higashimura Akiko](https://mangadex.org/author/87387c78-387d-4fcc-97df-599a5ac9aea2/higashimura-akiko)’s place to study about manga before serialization of [Battle Studies](https://mangadex.org/title/728698ee-f78f-4257-8b8d-212e0b3a6037/battle-studies).

Friends with [Suzunoki Yuu](https://mangadex.org/author/14dc9049-3228-47b8-aa13-71428ce2c98b/suzunoki-yuu) and [ABD Inoue](https://mangadex.org/author/8f1d87fb-af4f-4e95-b376-4055bbcf3a61/abd-inoue).

altTitles.vi: Thả Vu Nữ Đó Ra

description.en: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

title.en: Danshi Koukousei, Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei Suru.

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生、乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢に転生する。

altTitles.en: A High School Boy Reincarnates as the Villainous Daughter in an Otome Game.

description.en: One day, "I," an ordinary high school boy living in the present day, was hit by a truck and reincarnated in another world. But what a surprise it was to find out that I was reincarnated as Elena Evan, the "villainess" of an otome game! If this continues, the future that awaits me will either be condemnation, execution, or exile... I want to avoid that at all costs. While I was worrying about this, I found a glimmer of hope. If Tiara, the main heroine, and I could get together and find a yuri route for us, maybe we could avoid a bad ending...? However, I am now beset by a number of beautiful and handsome men...?
description.ja:
現代に生きるごく普通の男子高校生である「俺」は、ある日トラックに轢かれて異世界に転生してしまう。しかし、転生した先はなんと乙女ゲームの「悪役令嬢」エレナ・エヴァンだった――！

このままだと待つ未来は、断罪・死刑・国外追放……。それだけはなんとしても阻止したい。悩んだ俺はひとつの光を見出す。正ヒロインのティアラと俺が結ばれて百合ルートになれば、バッドエンドを回避できるんじゃないか…!?

しかし、そんな俺の前に立ちはだかるのは見目麗しい数々のイケメンたちで――!?

description.en:
During the Xiande period of the Dazhou dynasty, the Prince of Jianxing, Shen Wei, suffered defeat at the Chashi river in the northeast, leading to the Six Prefectures of Zhongbo almost falling to external foes. Shen Zechuan, meanwhile, was arrested and taken to the capital, to be the target of everyone's hatred as the surviving villain. When the young son of the Prince of Libei, Xiao Chiye, heard the news, he came and delivered a ruthless blow that nearly cost Shen Zechuan his life. Unexpectedly, the latter, who had seemed weak, was actually quite fierce, turning around and biting him, causing the former to bleed profusely. Henceforth, an enmity developed between the two, with the strife continuing both within and outside the court. Amidst this open and secret conflict, the true reason for Shen Wei's defeat was surprisingly discovered.

---
**Note:**
- After a huge backlash about the character design, the series has been undergoing a revision with a new art style, This title contains the revised version.

description.en:
The Six Prefectures of Zhongbo were ceded away in surrender to the external enemies, and Shen Zechuan was taken into custody in the capital, reduced to a drowning dog loathed and condemned by all. Xiao Chiye followed the scent of the furor and made his way over. But instead of setting others on him, he kicked Shen Zechuan with his very own leg that rendered the latter an invalid. Who would expect this invalid to turn around and bite him in a counterattack until he was all drenched in blood? That was the start of an epic feud between both men who tear at each other every time they come face-to-face with one another.

---
**Note:**
- After a huge backlash about the character design, the series has been undergoing a revision with a new art style, This title contains the old version.
description.pl:
Shen Zechuan jest ósmym synem zdradzieckiego księcia Jianxing, człowieka, który skazał swoje miasta i ludzi na zagładę z rąk wroga. Jako jedyny żyjący członek swojej linii, Shen Zechuan jest znienawidzony przez cały naród. A nienawiść nikogo nie płonie goręcej niż uczucie Xiao Chiye, najmłodszego syna potężnego księcia Libei.

Xiao Chiye niczego nie pragnie bardziej niż śmierci Shen Zechuana, ale ten wbrew wszelkim przeciwnościom trzyma się życia. Zamiast poddać się hańbie swojej rodziny, staje się cierniem w boku Xiao Chiye, wdzierając się do bezwzględnego świata politycznego stolicy. Jednak gdy ci dwaj zaciekli wrogowie walczą z więzami swojego losu, zostają przyciągnięci do siebie siłą, której żaden z nich się nie spodziewa — i żaden z nich nie może mieć nadziei, że się jej oprze.

altTitles.ja: 帰ってきた元勇者

description.en:
Once, a hero has been summoned to a different world in order to defeat the demon king. After the war stretching 3 years ended, the commendable hero slayed the demon king. And he was forcibly deported back to earth after being dismissed.

"Give me a break! Elves in addition to beast race, dwarfs and demon race. Even though I wanted to make a harem in the different world I saved! My dream will not come true on earth, where there is no magic at all."

Thus, the hero returns on his own. Without the blunder of being extradited to earth this time, he will build a harem of his own in a different world.
description.ja: かつて魔王を倒すため異世界に召喚された勇者ハルトは、冒険と苦労の末見事魔王を倒すことに成功する。 世界を救った俺は女の子にモテモテ…可愛い女の子にあんなことやこんなこと♡を …そんなよこしまな妄想を膨らませていたハルトだったが、 戦後の権力争いのせいで、すぐに元の世界へ強制送還されてしまった――！ 「そんな馬鹿な！俺は異世界でハーレムを作りたかったのに！」 今度こそ、純粋（！？）な夢を叶えるため、元勇者ハルトは自力で異世界へ戻ることに。 しかし到着した場所は以前救った世界とは違うようで、別の勇者や魔王がいて…！？
description.pt:
Uma vez, um herói foi convocado para um mundo diferente para derrotar o rei demônio. Depois da guerra que durou 3 anos, o herói louvável que matou o rei demônio, foi mandado à força de volta à Terra depois de ser dispensado.  
  
"Me dá um tempo!  
Elfos, além da raça de bestas, anões e demônios.  
Mesmo que eu quisesse fazer um harém no mundo diferente que salvei!  
Meu sonho não se tornará realidade na terra, onde não há mágica nenhuma. "  
  
Assim, o herói retorna por conta própria.  
Sem a asneira de ser extraditado para a Terra desta vez, ele construirá seu próprio harém em um mundo diferente..
description.pt-br: Uma vez, um herói foi convocado para um mundo diferente para derrotar o rei demônio. Depois da guerra que durou 3 anos, o herói louvável que matou o rei demônio, foi mandado à força de volta à Terra depois de ser dispensado. "Me dá um tempo! Elfos, além da raça de bestas, anões e demônios. Mesmo que eu quisesse fazer um harém no mundo diferente que salvei! Meu sonho não se tornará realidade na terra, onde não há mágica nenhuma". Assim, o herói retorna por conta própria. Sem a asneira de ser extraditado para a Terra desta vez, ele construirá seu próprio harém em um mundo diferente

altTitles.ja: 天空戦記シュラト

description.en:
Shurato (Akito Hidaka) , a hot-blooded boy who loves fighting and has a good mood, and Gai (Gai Kuroki) , who has a quiet and loving personality . Although the two had very different personalities, they were best friends.

However, the two were wrapped in a big light during the karate match. When Shurat wakes up alone, he is told by Vishnu, the god of harmony , that this is a different world from the human world, the "heavenly world." He is told that he was one of the members of the group, "Shurao".

However, immediately after that, Indra, the thunder emperor of the deva army, suddenly rebelled, turned Vishnu into stone, and ordered Shurat to subjugate him. Shurat and his friends, who were sent to a distant land by Vishnu's last power, set out on a journey to the heavenly palace in order to defeat Indra and save Vishnu and the heavenly world.

Standing in their way are their former companions. Among them is Gai, who reincarnated as "King of Yasha", changed into a cruel personality after Shiva's spell encased him in a black stream of light, and relentlessly pursues the life of Shurat.

altTitles.ja: 天界異譚―スヴァル プラーナ

description.en: Passionate about martial arts, Shurato and his lifelong friend, Gai, compete in a tournament but a dazzling light transports them to the celestial world, a place inhabited by divine beings. Shurato then learns from the goddess Vishnu that he is the reincarnation of one of the eight celestial warriors who protect the harmony of the world. But, very quickly, he is accused of treason and is pursued by the other warriors, and in particular by Gai, his best friend who seems determined to kill him... Meanwhile, the army of the goddess Shiva, led by Indra, chief celestial warriors, is about to invade the celestial world……

title.en: They Are Still Being Shaken This Morning

altTitles.ja: 今朝も揺られてます

altTitles.en: They're Being Shaken This Morning Too

altTitles.vi: Thình Thịch Mỗi Sớm Mai

description.en:
This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love?
And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl!
Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.ja: 午前6時58分舞原行きの通学電車。名前も知らないあの子と僕…とその乗客!? 高校生の男女2人が醸し出す甘酸っぱい雰囲気に、乗客たちが心情駄々洩れで盛り上がる!!
description.uk: Це історія про таємне кохання, потяги та шиперство. Хлопець та дівчина щоранку їдуть 20 хвилин приміським потягом до різних шкіл та схоже він встиг закохатись за ці поїздки разом з нею. Чи зможе він зізнатися їй? А також... Те, про що вони не здогадуються: є ще 3 пасажири, які таємно підтримують таємне кохання хлопця до дівчини! Що очікувати наступної поїздки?
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

description.en:
Meet Kuromine Asahi, "the man who can't lie".  On his way home, he just learned an important secret: his crush, Shiragami Youko, is actually a vampire!  Can Asahi actually keep her secret?  
  
It's a fun, clumsy, one of a kind vampire romantic comedy!
description.ru:
Куроминэ не умеет врать. Но у всех есть свои секреты, и сам Куроминэ - не исключение. Он влюблён в элегантную и таинственную Сирагами… Но почему когда никто не видит, она расправляет крылья за спиной и обнажает острые клыки? Эта девушка определённо не такая, как остальные…  


---

- [Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/eiji_masuda_)
description.pt-br:
Conheça Kuromine Asahi, "O cara que não pode mentir", No caminho para casa, ele descobre um segredo importante. Que sua amada, Shiragami Youko, é na verdade uma vampira! Asahi poderá realmente guardar o segredo de Youko? 

Uma divertida e desajeitada comédia romântica ao estilo vampiro!

altTitles.ja: ペンと手錠と事実婚

altTitles.en: A Marker, Cuffs, and a De Facto Marriage
A Marker, Cuffs, & a De Facto Marriage

altTitles.vi: Hôn thú giữa bút và còng tay

altTitles.ar: بين قلم التعليم والأصفاد والزواج الفعلي

description.ar: يلتقي المحقق إيجي كيريسامي (40 عامًا)، وهو في منتصف العمر، بفتاة غريبة في المرحلة الثانوية في مسرح إحدى الجرائم. وعلى الرغم من أنها لا تنطق بكلمة، الا انها تساعد في حل القضية عبر رسوماتها. لكن فجأة، يتلقى هذا المحقق عرض زواج من هذه الفتاة!
description.en: A middle-aged detective, Eiji Kirisame (40), meets a strange high school girl at the scene of a certain crime. She doesn't speak a word, but she helps solve the case using her drawings. However, suddenly this middle-aged detective is getting a marriage proposal from this girl!
description.ja: 中年刑事、切鮫鋭二(40)は、とある事件現場で声を出さない不思議な女子高生、梔子鶫に出会う。 事件の真相をド下手な絵で次々に明らかにしていく鶫に驚く切鮫だったが、突然、鶫から求婚されて―――？
description.vi: Kirisame Eiji, một cảnh sát luôn tận tâm với công việc quá mức đến nỗi không được lòng các đồng nghiệp của mình. Kuchinashi Tsugumi, một nữ sinh trung học kỳ lạ tuyệt chỉ giao tiếp bằng cây bút và quyển tập phác thảo của mình.Trong lúc Kirisame đang gặp bế tắc trong một vụ án mạng mà đồng nghiệp anh ai cũng cho rằng chỉ là một vụ tự sát, Tsugumi đã liên tiếp cho anh vô số lời gợi ý bằng những nét vẽ nguệch ngoạc của mình.Cuối vụ án, ngay vào lúc tính mạng của Tsugumi bị hung thủ đe doạ, Kirisame đã kịp thời cứu cô và bắt giữ tên tội phạm.Những tưởng mọi thứ đã xong Kirisame cảm thấy nhẹ nhõm, nhưng ngay sau đó, Tsugumi bất ngờ cầu hôn anh!?!?

title.en: Eroge no Sekai de Slow Life ~Issho ni Isekai Teni shitekita Yarisaa no Daigakusei-tachi ni Tsuihou sareta node, Henkyou de Muteki ni Natte Shin no Heroine-tachi to Yoroshiku Yarimasu~

altTitles.en: Slow Life in the World of Eroge: I Was Exiled by a Group of College Students From a Yarisaki Who Moved to Another World With Me, so I’m Going to Become Invincible in a Remote Area and Play Nice with the Real Heroines

description.en: Iijima Satoru is a 32 year old "VIRGIN". Out of the blue, he was transferred to another world, a fantasy EROGE in the middle ages...!? Boobs completely bare! He wanted to be a warrior,  setting this IDIOTIC game as a stage. But the all-age settings were applied to him
description.ja: ヤればヤるほど強くなる!? 飯島悟。32歳。童貞。今日も空しく上の階に住むオネーさんのバイブ音を聞きながら自家発電に励んでいた…が、突然天井が崩れて、下半身丸出しのオネーさんが降ってきた！　そして…合体……!? 気がつくと、そこは異世界。しかもバカゲーで有名なエロゲの世界だった。このゲーム、ヒロインはおっぱい丸出しか、下半身丸出しまたはTバックという、まさにパラダイス！さらに、悟が持つスキルは『エロノート』。名前を書き込んだ相手からの好感度がマックスになるとヤりたい放題の最強スキル！大喜びの悟だったが、想定外のピンチに見舞われて…!?

description.en:
One day, Dr. Shiro, a harmless and kind-hearted doctor of agriculture, is transported to another world along with his students and laboratory. It's a hopeless world where humans are treated as slaves and ruled by monster girls! In this grim world, he'll use his knowledge of pharmacology to subvert and control the cruel monster girls!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63813)
description.ja: 人畜無害で心優しき農学博士・シローはある日、ゼミの生徒と共に研究室ごと異世界に転移してしまう。そこは人間が奴隷として扱われ、モンスター娘たちが支配する絶望的な世界であった―――！殺伐異世界で、残虐モンスター娘たちを薬学知識で堕とし、支配せよ！！

biography.en: **Native name**: インド僧

altTitles.ja: やまとは恋のまほろば

description.en:
College student Sanwa Honoka is ridiculed by male students for her plump figure. As her best friend gets the most out of college life, her only solace is the Ancient Tomb Study Group, where she can talk about her favorite things, surrounded by two laid-back male members. However, Honoka considers member Iida as a lover at a certain moment. A poetic psychological depiction of how a girl with low self-esteem finds spiritual support and matures.

---
Note: The series moved to Bunshun Online website in April 2022 and started releasing new chapters in June 2022. All 3 volumes that were published by Line, were released again by Bungei Shunjuu as shinsouban (new cover edition) as of September 2022.

A Jury Selection award winner in the Manga Section of the 23rd Japan Media Arts Festival.

altTitles.ja: 男勝りの女の子
ノっぴきならぬ

description.en:
Seven years ago, Toraji met the most beautiful man he had ever seen.

The time they spent together was as passionate as it was brief, and the man disappeared among the multitudes of Edo, the shogunate's capital. Toraji never learned his real name, or address, or occupation - but he never gave up on finding him again.

Only, he didn't expect that when he did, the man would turn out to be the master of a high-class ryokan and restaurant, or that he would have a young daughter. How did this happen? Why did he run? Who is the child's mother and where is she?

And most of all, will Toraji get a second chance to pursue the one great love of his life?

description.en: Aoba is a first-year high school student who takes care of his younger siblings in place of his busy parents, and ends up at a sibling playdate in the home of his classmate Mizudori, a cool beauty known as the "Ice Princess".
description.ja:
多忙な両親に代わり、保育園児の弟妹を世話する男子高校生の青葉実晴は、恋愛をする暇はないが、弟妹と楽しく過ごしていた。ある日、クラスメートで「氷の姫様」と呼ばれるクール美女・水鳥雪の自宅で遊ぶことになった青葉は、「私を笑顔にしてくれませんか？」と水鳥に頼まれて…！？ 

幼い弟妹を大切に想う高校生たちの青春ラブコメ開幕！
description.pt-br: Aoba é um estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio que cuida de seus irmãos mais novos no lugar de seus pais ocupados e acaba indo a um encontro de brincadeiras para irmãos na casa de sua colega Mizudori, uma beleza fria conhecida como a "Princesa de Gelo".

altTitles.ja: からすの課長さまっ!

description.en: Nitori is dead. Or at least he should be, except, he was sent by mistake to the Bird Afterlife instead of the human one. Chief Karasuma, a raven deity and also a salaried afterlife manager, is unamused at first, but then concedes to give Nitori a chance to work for him. Nitori loves birds, and even more so, he loves chief Karasuma, with his glossy feathers and powerful beak. How will he manage this strange new... afterlife?

description.en:
Nitori and chief Karasuma are new parents to an adorable brood of... small deities who look just like chicks!

What does parenting look like, when you live between the human world and the bird afterlife, between the human and the divine?

Find out in this collection of three extra stories that follow the events of [Karasu no Kachou-sama](https://mangadex.org/title/05a62dc9-7eec-437a-ab0e-9427a9fd7190/karasu-no-kachou-sama) and [Karasu no Danna-sama!](https://mangadex.org/title/8f9aaf0e-0894-4e67-896e-ff5bf072cc57/karasu-no-danna-sama)

However, that tranquility, and their very relationship, is put to the test when they visit together Karasuma's homeland. Is there a warm nest and baby chicks is the future of the newlyweds, or...?

altTitles.ja: TRIP LOVERS‐対の手‐

description.en:
On his way home from work after an all-nighter, the workaholic Dr. Jikumaru Touji falls through a mysterious hole and wakes up in... another world!
There, he stumbles upon the nearly dead assassin Naina and saves him with his "healing powers," but come morning, he discovers that for some reason, he now looks like a kid!?
Jik (Jikumaru) starts looking for a way to return, while Naina protects him from this strange new world where the only law seems to be the law of the jungle. While Jik is busy with that, though, he starts to feel that maybe living in this world together with Naina wouldn't be so bad... but is that possible?

description.en:
Yasuda Yutaka, on his way home from work, accidentally goes through a portal which suddenly appeared before him. On the other side, a completely different mysterious world! It's been five years since then and he still hasn't figured out the way back. To earn a living, he opened an okonomiyaki shop which is doing really well, so he's also getting used to life in this world.  
  
However, he has a problem. Many suitors come knocking, fixated upon him for his black hair and black eyes which are considered rare in this world! And – the way to propose is to have a duel! Because of that, his life has hung on the balance many times until he's driven into a corner when the strongest suitor finally makes his appearance…!

description.en: Middle school brawler Noboru Haitani has never lost a fight. But the bitter taste of a soccer defeat gradually warms him up to the sport, until one day Haitani finds himself in a match against a team featuring middle school soccer prodigy Takami. An outlaw fights his way into the world of soccer!

description.en:
***The world is filthy...***
Nakayama, a high schooler with an extreme case of germophobia, just wants to enjoy his own peaceful time in a perfectly clean space, away from everyone else. But his quiet life is constantly thrown into chaos by Nishino, the cheerful, albeit messy girl who just so happens to sit next to him.
*"Don’t pollute my sanctuary!"*
*"Don’t mess with my alone time!"*
Despite his desperate pleas, the madness continues.
It’s a chaotic, heart-thumping romcom between a cleanliness-obsessed boy and a carefree high school girl!
description.ja: 世の中は汚い…。潔癖症をこじらせ中の高校生・中山は、誰ともかかわらず綺麗な空間で自分だけの時間を楽しもうするが、隣の席になった西野さんにいつも振り回される。僕の聖域を汚さないでくれ！僕の時間を邪魔しないでくれ！主人公の願いとは裏腹に、今日も今日とて振り回される、潔癖こじらせ男子×天真爛漫JKのわちゃわちゃラブコメディ!!

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

description.en:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn't have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.

Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.

Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?
___
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**
___
