Heesu's world revolves around Chanyoung, his best friend and secret crush. He doesn't mind cheering Chanyoung from the sidelines or listening to all his girl problems. He doesn't care if people only know him as "Chanyoung's friend." Then one day, Heesu starts hearing his name everywhere. On the bus, in the halls, during lunch… Turns out, there's a rumor going around school (Got a love problem? Find Heesu in Class 2 and he'll tell you what to do!) and with that, Heesu suddenly finds himself the center of attention. But how could he give anyone advice? He doesn't even know what to do about his own crush!
description.fr: Le monde de Heesu tourne autour de Chanyoung, son meilleur ami dont il est secrètement amoureux. Cela ne le dérange pas d’encourager Chanyoung en étant qu’un spectateur ou bien d’écouter tous ses problèmes de fille. Il s’en fiche que les gens le considèrent comme seulement son « ami ». Cependant un jour Heesu commence à entendre son nom de partout : dans le bus, dans le hall et même pendant la pause de midi ? Une rumeur circule dans l’école : Vous avez un problème ? Trouvez Heesu dans la Classe 2 et il vous dira que faire ! Heesu se retrouve soudainement au centre de l’attention. Mais comment il peut conseiller quelqu’un alors qu’il sait pas quoi faire pour son propre amour.

altTitles.ja: スライム聖女

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!
description.fr:
Il était une fois un slime qui souhaitait devenir humain.
Un jour, il rencontra un congénère ayant l'apparence d'une humaine et qui lui expliqua sa méthode : trouver un cadavre frais d'humain, et remplacer son sang par son corps de slime !
Le réceptacle qu'il trouve est finalement celui de Jelly, une jeune fille de la noblesse ayant des pouvoirs de Sainte. Fort malheureusement, celle-ci avait un horrible caractère et menait la vie dure a ses serviteurs, ce qui entraîna son assassinat.
Pour vivre sa vie idéale d'humain, le slime n'a maintenant d'autre choix que de remplacer Jelly et de reconstruire peu à peu sa réputation !
description.ja: 人間に憧れた最弱魔物（スライム）が乗っ取ったのは、聖女だけど性格最悪な極悪令嬢・ジェリィの体だった！　折角人間に成ることが出来たのに、周りの人間たちから恨まれ嫌われているうえに、魔物（スライム）とバレたら即終了のバッドエンドまっしぐら…!?
description.ru: Самый слабый монстр (слайм), мечтающий стать человеком, вселяется в тело злодейки с ужасной репутацией! Если будет раскрыта её истинная сущность, то она будет немедленно уничтожена, поэтому она будет стремиться стать всеми любимой, чтобы жить безопасной и комфортной жизнью!

___
Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。
description.es-la: Nezumi es una niña que fue criada como sicaria por los yakuza y creció sin conocer el amor humano. Un joven corriente, Ao, no sabe nada. Se enamoran y empiezan a vivir juntos, pero la mano del mal está cerca... Esta es una historia del primer amor, tan cruel y tan triste.
description.pt-br:
Nezumi, uma garota criada como uma assassina pela yakuza, cresceu sem conhecer o amor humano. Ao, um jovem comum, não sabe nada sobre o passado sombrio dela. Mesmo assim, eles se apaixonam e começam a viver juntos, mas o perigo está à espreita... Esta é uma história de um primeiro amor, tão cruel e triste.

Leia o oneshot prequel, que conta a história de origem da Messiah-chan, [aqui](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).

description.en: Shishio Academy is a prestigious, the best school in Japan, in which only the elite of such fields as study, sports, pedigree can study. But in reality it is a school of principles of “devouring the weak by the strong”, where everything is measured by the results of the games. This is a massacre in which only a definite winner can survive. Guren is a legend of the shadow world, conquering and invincible, and at the same time he wants to start a normal, carefree life. He fails the entrance exams to the academy on purpose, therefore, following his results, he qualifies as the lowest grade F. However, after reuniting with his younger sister Karen, the situation changes dramatically. And when his sister is in danger, he shows his true abilities!
description.ja: 学業、運動、家柄、あらゆる分野のエリートだけを集めた日本最高峰の名門校・獅子王学園。だがその実態は、ゲームの結果ですべてが評価される弱肉強食の学園。絶対的な強者――獅子のみが生き残れる修羅の世界だった。裏世界のゲームで常勝無敗の伝説を残しながらも、面倒のない普通の人生を歩みたい主人公・砕城紅蓮は、入学試験で手を抜き、目論見通り最低位のＦランクに認定される。しかし兄を心から愛する血の繋がった妹・砕城可憐と再会し、事態は急変。そして学園の『悪意』が可憐を襲ったとき、紅蓮は真の実力を発揮する――！
description.ru:
Академия Шишио - престижная, лучшая в Японии школа, учиться в которой может лишь элита таких сфер, как учеба, спорт, родословная. Но в действительности это школа принципов "пожирания слабых сильными", где всё оценивается результатами игр. Это бойня, в которой может выжить лишь несомненный победитель.   
Главный герой Сайджо Гурен - легенда теневого мира, побеждающий и непобедимый, и вместе с тем он желает начать обычную, беззаботную жизнь. Вступительные экзамены в академию он проваливает нарочно, поэтому по его итогам квалифицируется как самый низкий ранг F. Однако, после воссоединения с кровной младшей сестрой Сайджо Карен, ситуация резко меняется. И когда сестру поджидают опасности, он проявляет истинные способности!

description.en:
Shida Naori is a college student who loves making alcoholic drinks but has no friends to share them with. At a mixer, she meets Ibuki Hinata, who she ends up taking home with her. After making her a drink, Naori discovers that Hinata is an ogre-girl descended from Shuten-doji who needs alcohol to live, can only drink alcohol offered to her by humans, and grows horns whenever she drinks. Thus, Hinata decides to make Naori her personal bartender.

---

description.vi: Shida Naori là một cô sinh viên 20 tuổi với một niềm đam mê với cocktail nhưng lại chẳng có ai để uống cùng. Rồi một hôm, cô phát hiện ra rằng cô gái mà cô mang về nhà sau một bữa tiệc lại là một quái nữ, hậu duệ của Shutendoji, và đã quyết định làm bartender riêng của cổ. Những hậu duệ của Shutendoji cần uống rượu như ăn thức ăn, nhưng họ lại bị nguyền rủa là chỉ có thể uống được đồ có cồn mà con người mời.

description.en: Everyday is a normal day in the small town where Kasuga Arata lives. However, everything changed on the day of the Black Sun, and following it, a magician appears before him. The Black Sun caused the Breakdown Phenomenon which destroyed the town where he lives. Because of this, his normal life was artificially reconstructed by a Grimoire that his childhood friend had left. Just what is the purpose of the magician coming to the town? What will he do with the Grimoire's keepsake?
description.pt-br:
Arata Kasuga está vivendo uma vida comum com sua prima, Hijiri, quando um acontecimento misterioso chamado "Fenômeno do Colapso" a faz desaparecer diante de seus olhos. Determinado a erradicar o Fenômeno do Colapso e trazer Hijiri de volta, Arata se matricula na Academia Real Biblia. É uma estrada difícil pela frente, mas nada é impossível quando você tem sete lindas garotas — cada uma mestre em sua própria arte mágica — ao seu lado! A comédia romântica e a história às vezes séria da escola de bruxas começa!

description.en:
In the future, Utopia has finally been achieved thanks to medical nanotechnology and a powerful ethic of social welfare and mutual consideration. This perfect world isn't that perfect though, and three young girls stand up to totalitarian kindness and super-medicine by attempting suicide via starvation. It doesn't work, but one of the girls—Tuan Kirie—grows up to be a member of the World Health Organization. As a crisis threatens the harmony of the new world, Tuan rediscovers another member of her suicide pact, and together they must help save the planet…from itself.  
  
Adapted from the novel of the same name (published in english by [Haikasoru](http://www.haikasoru.com/harmony/)).  
The novel was also adapted into an [anime movie](https://myanimelist.net/anime/28211/Harmony).

description.en: Girls, guns, and grenades! Meet Rally Vincent and Minnie May. By day, they work at the Chicago gun shop that they own. By night (or holidays or week-ends), they moonlight as a pair of bounty hunters called the Gunsmith Cats. Rally is an expert at firearms, being able to judge the condition of a gun with a glance, and being an expert marksman. Minnie May is younger and less disciplined; and has an absolute fascination with explosives. Lots of explosives. Especially big ones. Together, they form an unbeatable team; much to the consternation of the local ATF bureau. Set in the city of Chicago, this action-adventure series features a lot of gunfights, car chases, and general mayhem.
description.es-la: ¡Chicas, armas y granadas! Les presento a Rally Vincent y Minnie May. De día, trabajan en la armería de Chicago que poseen. Por la noche (o los días festivos o fines de semana), trabajan como un par de cazarrecompensas llamados los Gatos Armeros (Gunsmith Cats). Rally es una experta en armas de fuego, capaz de juzgar el estado de un arma con sólo una mirada, y siendo una experta tiradora. Minnie May es más joven y menos disciplinada; y tiene una absoluta fascinación por los explosivos. Muchos explosivos. Especialmente los grandes. Juntas, forman un equipo imbatible; para consternación de la oficina local de la ATF. Ambientada en la ciudad de Chicago, esta serie de acción-aventura presenta muchos tiroteos, persecuciones de coches y caos general.
description.pt-br: Garotas, armas e granadas! Conheça Rally Vincent e Minnie May. Durante o dia, elas trabalham na loja de armas de sua propriedade em Chicago. À noite (ou feriados ou fins de semana), elas trabalham como uma dupla de caçadoras de recompensas chamadas de Gunsmith Cats. Rally é uma especialista em armas de fogo, sendo capaz de julgar a condição de uma arma com um olhar e sendo uma atiradora experiente. Minnie May é mais jovem e menos disciplinada; e tem um fascínio absoluto por explosivos. Muitos explosivos. Especialmente os grandes. Juntos, elas formam uma equipe imbatível; para grande consternação do escritório local do ATF. Passada na cidade de Chicago, esta série de ação e aventura apresenta muitos tiroteios, perseguições de carros e confusão geral.

description.en:
Rally Vincent and Minnie-May Hopkins are two regular American girls. Regular American girls who own a gun shop and might have dabbled in prostitution, respectively. And who happen to be a crack shot and an explosives expert, respectively.  
  
These might be odd skills for American girls, but these two happen to be Chicago's top bounty hunters. Rally can shoot the trigger off a gun from a good distance, and May generally wreaks havoc with explosions and cuteness. And together, with some very useful friends and associates, they make up the Gunsmith Cats.  
  
Burst finds our ladies back at work, back in action, and… back in trouble.

description.en:
What do world governments do when they learn that fantastical beings are not merely fiction, but flesh and blood-not to mention feather, hoof, and fang? Why, they create new regulations, of course, like the Interspecies Cultural Exchange Accord! When twenty-something Kimihito Kurusu becomes an involuntary “volunteer” in the government homestay program for monster girls, his world is turned upside down.

A lamia named Miia is sent to live with him, and it’s Kimihito’s job to make sure the sexy snake girl integrates into everyday life. While cold-blooded Miia is hot for Kimihito, the penalties for interspecies breeding are dire. Even worse, when a buxom centaur girl, and a scantily-clad harpy move into Kimihito’s house, what’s a full-blooded young man with raging hormones to do?
description.ja: 一人暮らしの主人公少年の家に、ラミア、ハーピー、ケンタウロスといったモンスター娘たちが、なぜか続々と同居することになって……。
description.pt-br: Três anos atrás, o mundo veio a conhecer a existência de criaturas humanóides, depois que o governo decidiu parar de esconder a sua existência do mundo. Foi decidido que eles seriam integrados à sociedade , e assim o “intercâmbio cultural entre espécies” foi criado. Desde então, o programa de intercâmbio cultural tornou-se um enorme sucesso ajudando muitas espécies se integrar na sociedade humana. Kurusu Kimihito é um voluntário?,neste programa de intercâmbio foi lhe dado uma Lamia (Mulher Cobra) chamada Miia para cuidar. Depois de passar algum tempo juntos, Miia se apaixona por Kurusu, que não é uma coisa tão ruim assim. No entanto, existe uma cláusula no programa de intercâmbio que proíbe cruzamento entre humanos e criaturas besta. Violar essa lei resulta em uma punição severa para o ser humano. Será que Kurusu é capaz de resistir aos avanços da Miia e manter-se longe de problemas?

The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable… (MANGA Plus)
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...

description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

description.ar: قصر فاخر في أفضل مكان بطوكيو. يعيشُ سبعة أشقاء من عائلة شيونجي، وجميعهم جميلونَ للغاية. ونرى مغامرة أراتا العائلية بين صراع إيجاد الذات والوصول إلى أهدافهِ كونهُ الابن الأكبر للعائلة
description.en: The love between brother and sister. The love between man and woman. That which is most forbidden is most unyielding. The two sons and five daughters of the Shiunji family shine like brilliant gems, each with intelligence and beauty in equal measure. And with the pedigree of their wealthy father behind them, how could they not be the talk of the town? Eldest son Arata has spent his life being tossed around by the whims of his colorful sisters, yet a little teasing won't stop him from valuing his family over anything and anyone else. But when his youngest sister turns fifteen, their father reveals a long-hidden secret of the Shiunji "siblings" and knocks Arata's world off its axis...
description.ja: 世田谷の豪邸に住む紫雲寺家の７人兄弟姉妹は、才色兼備で巷でもその名を轟かせている。長男の新は、個性の強い５人の姉妹に振り回されながらも家族を大切にして過ごしてきた。しかし、末の妹の誕生日会で父親から驚きの事実を告げられ、兄弟姉妹の運命は一変する―!?
description.pt-br: O amor entre irmão e irmã. O amor entre homem e mulher. Aquilo que é mais proibido é mais inabalável. Os dois filhos e as cinco filhas da família Shiunji brilham como pedras preciosas, cada um com inteligência e beleza incoparáveis. E com o pedigree de seu rico pai por trás deles, como poderiam não ser o assunto da cidade? O filho mais velho, Arata, passou a vida sendo infernizado pelos caprichos de suas deslumbrantes irmãs, mas nenhuma  provocação iria o impedir de valorizar sua família acima de tudo e de todos. Mas quando sua irmã mais nova completa quinze anos, seu pai revela um segredo há muito escondido dos "irmãos" Shiunji e vira o mundo de Arata de cabeça para baixo...

description.en:
A shinigami, as a god of death, can kill any person—provided they see their victim's face and write their victim's name in a notebook called a Death Note. One day, Ryuk, bored by the shinigami lifestyle and interested in seeing how a human would use a Death Note, drops one into the human realm.  
  
High school student and prodigy Light Yagami stumbles upon the Death Note and—since he deplores the state of the world—tests the deadly notebook by writing a criminal's name in it. When the criminal dies immediately following his experiment with the Death Note, Light is greatly surprised and quickly recognizes how devastating the power that has fallen into his hands could be.  
  
With this divine capability, Light decides to extinguish all criminals in order to build a new world where crime does not exist and people worship him as a god. Police, however, quickly discover that a serial killer is targeting criminals and, consequently, try to apprehend the culprit. To do this, the Japanese investigators count on the assistance of the best detective in the world: a young and eccentric man known only by the name of L.
description.kk: Иәгами Лайт — үлкен болашағы бар оқушы және ол іші пысқаннан шаршап кетті. Бірақ оның бәрі ажал құдайы Рүк тастап кеткен Ажал Дәптерін тапқанда өзгереді. Есімі дәптерге жазылған кез келген адам өледі екен, енді Лайт дүниені зұлымдықтан тазарту үшін Ажал дәптерінің күшін пайдалануға ант етті. Алайда қылмыскерлер өле бастағанда, билік өлтірушіні іздеуге аты аңызға айналған детектив L-ді жібереді. L оның артынан аңди бастағанда, Лайт өзінің асыл мақсатынан ба... әлде өмірінен айырыла ма?
description.pt: A história gira em torno do estudante Yagami Raito que encontra por acaso o caderno de um "Shinigami", um "Deus da Morte, cujo nome é Death Note". Raito/Light percebe que ao escrever o nome de alguém no caderno, a pessoa literalmente morre, assim, ele pretende criar um mundo perfeito, um novo mundo.
description.ru: Ягами Лайт — образцовый 17-летний выпускник, баллы за экзамены которого находятся в первых строках рейтинга всей Японии. Сидя на уроке, он замечает, что за окном что-то упало. На перемене он поднимает загадочный предмет и им оказывается черная тетрадь с надписью «Тетрадь смерти». Внутри была инструкция по использованию: «Человек, имя которого будет записано в тетради, умрет». Имея свои взгляды на систему наказания, Лайт решает установить собственное правосудие, использовать тетрадь для «очищения» мира от зла — убивать преступников.Когда действия Лайта становятся заметны для мирового правительства, на след неуловимого «Киры» (так мир окрестил нового мессию, решившего искоренить зло на планете) выходит детектив мирового класса, называющий себя «L», который поставил себе цель — разоблачить убийцу.
description.pt-br: Sem nada de interessante para fazer no Mundo dos Shinigamis, o Deus da Morte Ryuk deixa cair intencionalmente na Terra o seu Death Note.O caderno possui poderes macabros: a pessoa que tem seu nome escrito nele, morre! O Death Note acaba indo parar na mão de Light Yagami. Aluno exemplar, porém entediado, ao descobrir os sinistros poderes do caderno negro, ele decide virar um justiceiro e varrer a criminalidade da face da Terra. As seguidas mortes de criminosos em vários países diferentes acabam chamando a atenção da Interpol, que, por sua vez, pede ajuda ao maior detetive do mundo, conhecido apenas por "L", para resolver o caso. Inicia-se assim um frenético jogo de gato e rato entre Light e seu perseguidor implacável , enquanto Ryuk diverte-se com os acontecimentos que se desenrolam em decorrência do uso do Death Note.

biography.en:
Takeshi Obata (小畑 健, Obata Takeshi, born February 11, 1969) is a Japanese manga artist that usually works as the illustrator in collaboration with a writer. He first gained international attention for Hikaru no Go (1998–2003) with [Yumi Hotta](https://mangadex.org/author/10e45c0d-a7d7-4f10-b56a-bd0a4445236c/hotta-yumi), but is better known for Death Note (2003–2006) and Bakuman (2008–2012) with [Tsugumi Ohba](https://mangadex.org/author/0669bf79-ca27-4f50-9b48-741fb235137f/ohba-tsugumi). Obata has mentored several well-known manga artists, including [Nobuhiro Watsuki](https://mangadex.org/author/e718ceea-6dff-4297-bd36-1cecaf077e83/watsuki-nobuhiro) of Rurouni Kenshin fame, Black Cat creator [Kentaro Yabuki](https://mangadex.org/author/a36f5f24-d009-46b5-bee3-b0ceb6a52067/yabuki-kentaro), and Eyeshield 21 artist [Yusuke Murata](https://mangadex.org/author/47cd4e57-3fc4-4d76-97e4-b3933a5b05ef/murata-yuusuke).

On September 6, 2006, Obata was arrested for illegal possession of an 8.6 cm knife when he was pulled over in Musashino, Tokyo for driving with his car's headlights off at 12:30am. The artist claimed he kept the knife in his car for when he goes camping.

Is Kira’s story truly over, or does his influence linger?

In this complete collection of Death Note short stories penned by the series’ creators, discover tales of lives irrevocably changed by the sinister influence of the Death Note, with surprising and thrilling answers to the question of what it truly takes to use the Death Note…or fight it.

Contains stories “C-Kira,” “a-Kira,” the Death Note pilot chapter, vignettes of L’s life, and more.

DJ #2: If I Could Have One Wish Come True - Light kills L. L returns to haunt him as a ghost. R-18.

description.en: When Light Yagami finds a notebook giving him power over death, will he use it for good—or evil?   Light Yagami is an ace student with great prospects—and he’s bored out of his mind. But all that changes when he finds the Death Note, a notebook dropped by a rogue Shinigami death god. Any human whose name is written in the notebook dies, and Light has vowed to use the power of the Death Note to rid the world of evil. But will Light succeed in his noble goal, or will the Death Note turn him into the very thing he fights against?
Pairing: Light x L

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.tr: Ben, Yvonne, bir Otome oyununda zengin kötü karakter olarak reenkarne oldum. Oyunun hikayesine göre benim gibi herkesin nefret ettiği bir karakter, ana karaktere zorbalık yapmak, onu hoşlanabileceği çeşitli karakterlerin romantik rotalarına sürüklemek gibi bir ana göreve sahip. Ama görünen o ki Elsa’da bir gariplik var, kahraman! Benimle fazla yakınlaşıyor!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.en:
Wataru is a lonely boy who lost his parents in an accident. For some reason, there is one maid—her name is Kosame, and she has been by his side since he was little. Yes, she never changed... Set in a unique coastal fishing village with rows of houses called "boathouses," a love story of eternal love begins! (MTL)

---
**Links:**  
- Alternative Official Raw - [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM05203826010000_68) and [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62407)
description.ja: 事故で両親を亡くした天涯孤独な少年のワタル。そんな彼と何故かともに暮らす親代わりのメイドさんがひとり。彼女の名前はこさめといい、ワタルが小さなころからずっと変わらずそばにいる。そう、姿も変わらずずっと……。
description.vi: Wataru là một cậu bé cô đơn đã mất cha mẹ sau một tai nạn. Bằng một lí do nào đó, đã có một nàng hầu gái tên Kosame đã sống chung với cậu từ khi còn bé. Tuy nhiên vẻ ngoài của cô ấy chưa bao giờ thay đổi. Câu chuyện bắt đầu tại một thị trấn đánh cá ven biển với những hàng nhà bè trôi nổi. Và thế là một câu chuyện tình yêu vĩnh cửu bắt đầu.
description.es-la:
Wataru es un chico solitario que perdió a sus padres en un accidente. Por alguna razón tiene una maid que comienza a vivir con él en lugar de sus padres. Su nombre es Kosame y siempre ha estado al lado de Wataru desde que este era pequeño. Y sí, siempre ha tenido el mismo aspecto… 
Ambientada en un pueblo pesquero con hileras de casas llamadas Funaya, ¡Aquí es donde comienza esta historia de amor y persecución por el “Amor Eterno”!

altTitles.ja: 勇者と呼ばれた後に ―そして無双男は家族を創る―

altTitles.en: After Being Called a Hero: The Unrivaled Man Starts a Family

altTitles.vi: Sau khi được gọi là dũng giả: Người đàn ông vô song sẽ bắt đầu lập gia đình

description.en: In a world where humans and demons clash, the one who decimated the Demon Lord's army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd's companion!?
description.ja: 人間と魔族が争う世界――魔王軍を壊滅させたのはたったひとりの勇者、ロイドという男だった。魔王から神に近いとまで言われた力を持つロイドは戦後、王により辺境の領主を命じられ、遠ざけられた。さらにその地に棲む皇帝竜の討伐も頼まれたが、早々に倒してしまう。しかし敗れた竜は、美しい女性に変化し、ロイドの伴侶になることに!?これは最強と呼ばれながらも自分自身の価値を見つけられなかった男が「家族」を見つける物語。
description.vi: Trong một thế giới nơi con người và ác quỷ xung đột - người đã tiêu diệt quân đội của Ma vương là một dũng giả đơn độc có tên là Lloyd. Người sở hữu sức mạnh khủng khiếp đến mức được Ma vương cho là gần giống thần thánh, sau chiến tranh, Lloyd được nhà vua phong làm lãnh chúa của một vùng lãnh thổ nằm gần rìa biên giới vương quốc. Hơn nữa, anh còn được giao nhiệm vụ chinh phục Long vương đang cư trú tại vùng đất đó và anh đã nhanh chóng đánh bại được Long vương. Tuy nhiên, con rồng bị đánh bại đã biến thành một thiếu nữ xinh đẹp và đã chọn trở thành người bạn đời của Lloyd!? Đây là câu chuyện về một người đàn ông, được ca ngợi là người mạnh nhất, nhưng không hề nhận ra giá trị của bản thân, mà đang tìm cho mình một “gia đình”.

description.ru:
У каждой семьи есть "секрет".
Минамото Сёта - ученик средней школы, живущий в детском доме. Однажды его решает приютить семья, живущая в богатом доме, где ему оказывают радушный прием. Но у них оказался "секрет" который не следует раскрывать всему миру.
description.es-la: Minamoto Shouta, un huérfano de 14 años que inesperadamente es adoptado por una familia adinerada, lo que él no sabía es que esta familia esconde un gran secreto. Una nueva comedia romántica de la autora de «A Couple of Cuckoos» Miki Yoshikawa.
description.pt-br: Cada família tem seus próprios "segredos"... Shouta Minamoto, um estudante do ensino médio, vive em um orfanato. Um dia, ele é adotado por uma família que mora em uma linda mansão em estilo japonês. Shouta é recebido de braços abertos, mas a família guarda um segredo que não deve ser revelado ao mundo.

description.en: High school home economics expert Tenichi earns extra money with a part-time job cleaning houses. But one day, Himari, the owner and model of the popular cosmetics brand Hima Riz, transfers into his class.
description.ja: 家事代行で家計を支える家守殿一のクラスに転校してきたのは、コスメブランドの社長兼モデルの女子のカリスマ・美野妃眞理！
description.tl: Si Tenichi, isang eksperto sa home economics sa high school, ay kumikita ng dagdag na pera sa pamamagitan ng part-time na trabaho sa paglilinis ng mga bahay. Pero isang araw, si Himari, ang may-ari at modelo ng sikat na cosmetics brand na Hima Riz, ay lumipat sa kanyang klase. Salubungin ang isang romantikong komedya na puno ng kalokohan sa pagitan ng isang dalagang presidente ng kumpanya at isang binatilyong tagalinis ng bahay!
description.pt-br: Tenichi, especialista em economia doméstica do ensino médio, ganha um dinheiro extra com um emprego de meio período limpando casas. Mas um dia, Himari, dona e modelo da popular marca de cosméticos Hima Riz, é transferida para sua classe.

description.en:
"If my guy friend turned into a girl, he would be the perfect girlfriend!"
Returning to his hometown after 10 years, Amano Koichi is thrilled to finally reunite with his childhood friend, Yukio Sawatari on the first day of school when suddenly, he turns female! 
Yukio is affected by "Sudden sex change syndrome", a rare condition present in one every ten thousand people which randomly changes their gender!
Koichi can't help but be flustered by his childhood friend's cuteness.
How will this complicate their relationship?
Will it develop into a forbidden romance?!
Find out in this exciting TSF Rom-com!
description.id:
Amano, yang kembali ke kota tempat dia tinggal sewaktu kecil untuk pertama kalinya setelah 10 tahun, bertemu Yukio Sawatari, seorang teman masa kecil di hari pertama pemindahan, ketika dia (seorang teman pria) menjadi wanita! Meskipun dia berbagi suka citanya, saat dia tiba-tiba berubah menjadi seorang gadis dan tidak bisa menyembunyikan rasa malunya. Yukio terkena penyakit seperti 100.000 orang lainnya, tiba-tiba menjadi seorang gadis yang disebut "spontaneous isomerism metamorphosis"!  
  
Teman masa kecil perempuan ♂ yang imut dan dalam kesulitan!? Cinta TSF (transeksual) Terlarang!  
  
Kalo gak paham baca ajalah, ada sinopsis juga gak guna.
description.ru: Амано Коичи вернулся в город, где жил ребенком, и впервые за десять лет встретил своего друга детства Юкио Саватари, когда тот внезапно превратился в женщину! Юкио не в состоянии скрыть смущение, ведь он неожиданно стал жертвой редчайшей болезни, так называемой «метаморфозой спонтанной изомерии»!
description.vi:
Khi trở về thành phố nơi từng sống sau 10 năm, Amano Koichi đã gặp lại người bạn tuổi thơ là Yukio Sawatari vào ngày đầu tiên ở trường mới thì bỗng nhiên Yukio lại đổi giới tính?! Anh bị ảnh hưởng bởi một căn bệnh chỉ có trong một trong mười nghìn người gọi là "hội chứng đổi giới đột ngột"! 

Từ đây bắt đầu câu truyện về tình yêu với người bạn tuổi thơ đổi giới.

altTitles.ja: トラウマ! 怪奇漫画集

description.en: Hideshi Hino is a master of horror manga. When discussing Hino's works, the word "trauma" is almost always mentioned to the degree that "trauma" has become almost synonymous with Hino. The nightmarish stories, the extreme depictions of cruelty, the absurd and unhappy endings and the unique world of weirdness and black humor all come together in Hino's works. Countless children have been traumatized by Hino's works, and the trauma has never left them. However, while the shocking content and grotesque illustrations are repulsive, the "bizarre and lyrical" world of Hino's works, which depict the sorrows of the deformed, fascinates people both in Japan and abroad. Revisiting them as an adult, you will realize the true essence of Hino's world. In this book, occult researcher Hiroki Terai picks out five stories from among Hino's many works that are inevitably traumatic. In a conversation between Mr. Hino and Mr. Terai, valuable stories about their creation are revealed. The book also includes a complete version of "Underwater" with a problematic scene that was cut from the previously available version restored, a sequel to "Tomorrow's Hell" set in the year 2020, and a rare work whose existence is unknown even among devoted fans. We hope to bring you new discoveries and new traumas.

altTitles.ja-ro: Maryoku 9999 man Zen Zokusei Tsukai no Dai Kenja

description.en:
Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
All over the world, Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from “The Calamity” was “The Great Sage”, Ichikami Atsumu.
But, despite being satisfied in his death, he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself, Kusanagi Minato.
Atsumu, waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future, is shocked to see a peaceful world, and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive.
For now, Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato, but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past, and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles
.After blowing off his bragging, low-levelled bullies, Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl, Mizuha Yuika, as well as his schoolmates and teachers.
What’s more, Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity, which was supposed to have been subdued, will return––
“It looks like my power is still needed”
Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?!
The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace.
With his reincarnation in the future set, the curtain opens on a new Hero’s story!

description.en:
Ayame, a top-notch assassin who has lived 25 years without any connection to romance, is convinced by a colleague to register on a dating app—while hiding her true identity!
She ends up matching with none other than her next target: Murai, the ruthless and cold-hearted young leader of a gang...!?
A fake love comedy where everything ends if her secret is exposed!!
description.vi:
Ayame, một sát thủ hàng đầu đã sống 25 năm mà không có bất kỳ mối liên hệ nào với tình yêu, được một đồng nghiệp thuyết phục đăng ký trên một ứng dụng hẹn hò trong khi vẫn che giấu danh tính thực sự của mình!
Cuối cùng, cô ấy lại ghép đôi với không ai khác ngoài mục tiêu tiếp theo của mình: Murai, thủ lĩnh trẻ tuổi tàn nhẫn và lạnh lùng của một băng đảng...!?
Một bộ phim hài tình yêu giả tạo, nơi mọi thứ sẽ kết thúc nếu bí mật của cô ấy bị tiết lộ!!
description.pt-br: Ayame, uma assassina de primeira linha que viveu 25 anos sem qualquer conexão com romances, é convencida por um colega a se cadastrar em um aplicativo de namoro — enquanto esconde sua verdadeira identidade! Ela acaba encontrando ninguém menos que seu próximo alvo: Murai, o jovem líder implacável e insensível de uma gangue...!? Uma comédia de amor falsa onde tudo acaba se seu segredo for revelado!!

description.en:
“You ate me, so at least give me some kind of compensation, yeah?!”

Dragon King: “Fine! I’ll give you a prepaid cultivation technique—comprehend it first, then catch up with the training later!”

Me: “You think that’s enough?! I had to smell your nasty dragon breath—mental damage times two, buddy!”

Dragon King: “What do you want from me?!”

Me: “From now on, we’re like immortals sharing a single health bar. All the damage? You take it!”

Dragon King: “Damn it! You lunatic! Why does my ten-thousand-war-chariots-level HP bar feel so short now?! Guess it’s time to get a job…”

After a man took fancy to him, his life experienced an enormous change. A Proud Son of Heaven with boundless prospects was reduced to the status of the other party’s lover. He became cautious and timid with every step he took. When everything was destroyed by the other party, he only wanted for that person to be unable to live in peace forever…
- - -
*Note: Due to Chinese censorship, a major plotline was changed in the manhua. In the novel mpreg was part of the main couple child being born but was changed to the child being born by a random women who abandoned her child and the child being found by the gong/seme/top.*

description.en: Getting revenge against rotten nobles who are power-hungry! A dark fantasy is about to unfold! In a world where abusing prisoners of war is considered normal, there was a genius mage named Rein who was bestowed the title of "Great Sage" despite being born as a prisoner. However, that prisoner along with his land and fame that he obtained, was nothing but thorn in the side of the nobles that needed to be purged. Rein, who was set up and killed mercilessly, used his magic to duplicate his own soul. He then reincarnates as the son and heir of his sworn enemy, and swears revenge against the nobles that killed him! Come, it's purging time.

description.en:
Sarutorine Aldike, or Sari, is a bright, cheerful princess who wants to go on an adventure because she is bored of her tiny little castle in the countryside. One day, a hoard of vicious demons known as "Oni" come knocking on her doorstep, threatening the lives of everyone in the Kingdom. Thankfully, they are saved by a lone traveler named Kibitsu Mikoto who slays these monsters with a mysterious "Peach Eye". Shocked by the dangers of the outside world, Sari decides to set off on a journey of her own. Little did she know that she will set in motion a chain of events that will come to determine the fate of this magical world.

Remake version of Cool Kyoushinsha’s popular webcomic of the same name.

Will Young-jang be able to survive in the city, which is said to be even more terrifying than the jungle?

description.en: Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?!
description.ja: 高校に行けば自然とモテると思っていた黒木智子…。しかし、無残な現実が襲いかかって来る！この状況をどう打破するか？
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.
description.pt-br:
Tomoko Kuroki naturalmente presumiu que ela seria popular quando chegasse ao ensino médio... mas então a realidade fria e dura se abateu para o ataque! Acontece que todos os pontos de popularidade que ela acumulou em seus simuladores de namoro de videogame valem a pena na vida real, e Tomoko está longe de estar preparada para passar pelo ensino médio!

Como ela pode esperar impressionar seus colegas quando ela nem consegue falar com eles?! Nasce uma nova heroína do ensino médio (talvez?)!

Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

description.en: While you were admiring the girl in the next seat, she might be eyeing you up, too…? A new kind of “neighborly” short-form pure love comedy!
description.fr:
Ikezawa, un des beaux gosses de son lycée, profite de sa position au sein de celui-ci pour se permettre d’être très taquin avec la gent féminine qui l’entoure. Cette réputation de pervers ne semble pas lui déranger, mais quelque chose le dérange réellement depuis peu. 

En effet, ce qui semblait être sa nouvelle proie, une jolie jeune fille du nom d’Eguchi, se révèle être une véritable perverse des beaux gosses, adorant taquiner ces derniers. Et notamment ce chère Ikezawa, qui n’a pas l’habitude qu’on le prenne à revers sur ses ambitions des plus perverses.

Son quotidien désormais chamboulé, comment va-t-il s’en sortir face à son némésis féminin ? Qui appréciera autant lui montrer ses charmes, dés plus dissimulés, que les siennes, et tout cela en public et sans gêne, bien entendu !
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。
description.pt-br: Enquanto você admirava a garota no assento ao lado, ela pode estar de olho em você também...? Um novo tipo de comédia de amor puro de curta duração "vizinhança"!

Now, she stands at a crossroads where a single choice can lead to irreversible consequences. Entre la ira, la confusión y un suprimido sentido de la justicia, Mina lucha con cómo usar su nuevo poder mientras se embarca en un nuevo viaje. ¿A dónde la llevará su poder?

description.en: Honjo Maki is a scenario writer for a game company. One night, while going home from work, she almost ran over a girl. By the end of the night, the mysterious girl writes a time and place on Maki's hand. It turns out that it's the venue for the concert of the band Liberty.
description.es: Honjo Maki es un escritora de escenarios para una compañía de juegos. Una noche, mientras volvía a casa del trabajo, casi atropella a una chica. Al final de la noche, la misteriosa chica escribe una hora y un lugar en la mano de Maki. Resulta que es el lugar del concierto de la banda Liberty.
description.it: Honjo Maki lavora come sceneggiatrice presso un'azienda di videogiochi. Una sera, tornando a casa dal lavoro, per poco non investe una ragazza. Prima di andarsene, la misteriosa ragazza scrive sulla mano di Maki un luogo e un orario. Si ritroverà al concerto di una band chiamata Liberty.
description.pt: Honjou Maki é uma escritora de cenário para uma empresa de jogos. Uma noite, indo para casa do trabalho, quase atropelou uma menina. No final da noite, a garota misteriosa escreve um horário e um lugar na mão de Maki. Acontece que é o local do concerto da banda Liberty.
